settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Need Help? We've Got You Covered.
settings.profileUpdatesDesc: You can update your name, phone, and address without entering a password.
settings.passwordChangesDesc: Password changes require additional verification for security.
settings.securityNoticeDesc: Password changes will log you out of all other devices for security.
settings.tipDesc: Use a strong password with at least 8 characters, including numbers and symbols.
settings.changePasswordDesc: Update your password to keep your account secure. All fields are required for password changes.
settings.paymentAlertsDesc: Get notified when a client completes a transaction or a payment is overdue.
settings.invoiceRemindersDesc: Stay updated about upcoming invoice due dates, pending payments, or cancellations.
settings.projectActivityUpdatesDesc: Receive alerts on project status changes, task assignments, and client interactions.
settings.twoFactorAuthEnabled: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication
settings.twoFactorAuthDisabled: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings.twoFactorAuthenticationDesc: Add an extra layer of security to your account with two-factor authentication
settings.twoFactorAuthenticationDesc2: Add an extra layer of security to your account with two-factor authentication verification.
settings.twoFactorAuthenticationEnabledDesc: Two-factor authentication has been successfully enabled for your account.
settings.twoFactorAuthenticationEnabledDesc2: You'll need to enter a verification code from your email each time you sign in.
settings.twoFactorAuthenticationDisabledDesc: Two-factor authentication has been disabled for your account.
settings.enableTwoFactorAuthenticationDesc: Enter your password to enable two-factor authentication. You'll receive a verification code via email.
settings.disableTwoFactorAuthenticationDesc: Enter your password to disable two-factor authentication for your account.
settings.verifyYourEmailDesc: We've sent a 6-digit verification code to
settings.passwordVerifiedDesc: Password verified! Check your email for the verification code.
settings.invalidPasswordDesc: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
settings.otpSentDesc: Verification code sent! Please check your email.
settings.failedToResendOTPDesc: Failed to resend verification code. Please try again.
settings.profileUpdateFailed: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
settings.fillAllPasswordFields: Please fill in all password fields
settings.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
settings.passwordChangeFailed: Failed to change password. Please check your current password.
settings.passwordChangedSuccess: Password changed successfully! You will be logged out from other devices for security.
settings.passwordChangeError: Failed to change password. Please try again.
settings.twoFactorUpdateFailed: Failed to update 2FA settings. Please try again.

settings.paymentAlertsDisabled: ðŸ”• Payment alerts disabled. You won't receive payment notifications.
settings.paymentAlertsUpdateFailed: Failed to update payment alert preferences. Please try again.
settings.invoiceRemindersEnabled: ðŸ“§ Invoice reminders enabled! You'll be notified about upcoming due dates and pending payments.
settings.invoiceRemindersDisabled: ðŸ”• Invoice reminders disabled. You won't receive invoice notifications.
settings.invoiceRemindersUpdateFailed: Failed to update invoice reminder preferences. Please try again.
settings.projectUpdatesEnabled: ðŸš€ Project activity updates enabled! You'll receive alerts on project changes and task assignments.
settings.projectUpdatesDisabled: ðŸ”• Project activity updates disabled. You won't receive project notifications.
settings.projectUpdatesUpdateFailed: Failed to update project activity preferences. Please try again.

validation.allPasswordFieldsRequired: If changing password, all password fields must be filled.
validation.currentPasswordLength: Current password must be 8-12 characters long.
validation.newPasswordLength: New password must be 8-12 characters long.
validation.confirmPasswordLength: Confirm password must be 8-12 characters long.
validation.passwordsMustMatch: New password and confirm password must match.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Track and manage project efficiently
projects.createProjectDesc: Fill the details to create a new project
projects.organizationRequired: You need to be part of an organization to create projects
projects.fileTooLargeToast: File size must be less than 10MB. Please choose a smaller file.
projects.fileTooLargeDropzone: File "{{name}}" is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
projects.fileTooLargeWarning: File is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
